title: Ticket #1711: CCB can cause the collector to run out of file descriptors
description: CCB should reject new registrations to avoid running out of file descriptors. When it does this, it would probably be a good idea to email the admin (but not more than once per day or something reasonable). Some room in the file descriptor table should be left for incoming requests.
